# c-icon

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                | Type     | Default          |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------- | -------- | ---------------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Fill color                 | `string` | `'currentColor'` |
| `path`   | `path`    | Svg path d attribute value | `string` | `undefined`      |
| `size`   | `size`    | Icon size in pixels        | `number` | `24`             |
